A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you are a serious Star Wars fan then this movie will cripple you with disappointment. My first response upon seeing it was \"star wars is dead\" and my friend said \"remember when you learned Santa wasn't real\" If Star Wars isn't an important franchise to you then you can enjoy it for its action\, and a shocking amount of comedy. The comedy was really sad for true fans as it repeatedly undercuts character development.
